emails.subject: Updated PTO Policy
emails.body:
Hi Team,

Please review the updated PTO policy effective January 1st. You can find the document in the HR portal.

Best regards,
HR Department

emails.subject: URGENT: Your Account Will Be Suspended!!!
emails.body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected unusual activity on your Microsoft account. Your account will be SUSPENDED within 24 hours unless you verify your identity immediately!

Click here to verify: https://micros0ft-secure.com/verify?id=RkxBR3tQSDFTSF9GMFVORH0=

Failure to act will result in permanent account deletion.

Microsoft Security Team

emails.subject: Your weekly job recommendations
emails.body:
Hi,

Here are some jobs we think you'd be great for:

- Senior Security Engineer at TechCorp
- Cloud Architect at CloudFirst
- DevOps Lead at StartupXYZ

View all recommendations in your LinkedIn feed.

LinkedIn Team

emails.subject: Scheduled Maintenance Tonight
emails.body:
Hello,

Please be advised that our email servers will undergo scheduled maintenance tonight from 11 PM to 2 AM EST.

You may experience brief interruptions during this window.

Thank you for your patience.

IT Support

emails.subject: Security alert: new sign-in from Windows
emails.body:
Hi developer,

We noticed a new sign-in to your GitHub account.

Device: Windows 10
Location: New York, NY, USA
Time: January 10, 2024 at 10:15 AM EST

If this was you, you can ignore this email.

If this wasn't you, please secure your account.

GitHub
